examples: Human beings need food, clothing and shelter.
Los seres humanos necesitan comida, ropa y refugio.
In developing countries, more than 640 million are without shelter.
En los países en desarrollo, más de 640 millones carecen de vivienda.
to take shelter from the storm
People were desperately seeking shelter from the gunfire.
La gente buscaba desesperadamente refugio de los disparos.
